VIII.iv.4.A.12.b
.
Requirement for a 30-Percent Rating
For additional benefits to be payable for a spouse, including for special monthly spouse’s compensation ratings, the Veteran must be entitled to compensation for disabilities evaluated as 30 percent or more disabling.
Reference
:  For more information on handling claims for additional compensation for dependents from Veterans with a combined disability rating that is less than 30 percent, see
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 1.A.4.c
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section A - Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section A
